page.title: 16Kingswood near Pentewan
page.content: Kingswood is a large wood stretching from London Apprentice to Pentewan.It is owned by the forestry commission who have been trying to stop horses and motorbikes from riding up there.About a year ago they put up boundaries just in from the beginning either side of a lane that leads up to a farm.This used to be a lane for pony and traps but it is very stoney and can only be used for riding up there. Recently one of the boundaries has been broken and riders use it as a jump. The forestry commission used to use the woods for shooting but they have stopped this now. They used to have man walking around keeping bikes out and planting new trees but he has gone and the trees are broken.
